category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 24 (Priority Disciplinary Measures)
contents: Article 24 (Priority Disciplinary Disposition) The Committee (including the Category Committee and City/Provincial Committee) shall only do so if the grounds for disciplinary action are sufficiently recognized against the person suspected of disciplinary action, if the related criminal case has not been deemed guilty, or if the investigative agency has not Even if an investigation is underway, disciplinary action may be taken pursuant to Article 31, Paragraphs 2 and 3. Revised 2019. 12. 20., 2022. 1. 24.
